Subject: Shutdown issue
Description:
HI Team,
I have a user who is on Ubuntu24 running the client -2.4.04_v2.4.3.1007 and noticed this pattern where its takes close to 5 - 10 mins to shutdown or reboot. Looking at the logs it points to EPP. Can you see whats the issue ?

Reg,
Bharani
Solution_Comment__c: Customer found a workaround: manually edit this file and make the following changes "TimeoutSec=30sec" instead of "TimeoutSec=5min" it shuts the machine down in 30 seconds. sudo systemctl edit --full epp-client-daemon.service.
